data.quote: What one programmer can do in one month, two programmers can do in two months.
data.author: Fred Brooks

data.quote: Every great developer you know got there by solving problems they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it.
data.author: Patrick McKenzie

data.quote: Rules of Optimization: Rule 1: Don't do it. Rule 2 (for experts only): Don't do it yet.
data.author: Michael A. Jackson

data.quote: A primary cause of complexity is that software vendors uncritically adopt almost any feature that users want.
data.author: Niklaus Wirth

data.quote: No one in the brief history of computing has ever written a piece of perfect software. It's unlikely that you'll be the first.
data.author: Andy Hunt

data.quote: Java is to JavaScript as ham is to hamster.
data.author: Jeremy Keith

data.quote: One of the best programming skills you can have is knowing when to walk away for awhile.
data.author: Oscar Godson

data.quote: Without requirements or design, programming is the art of adding bugs to an empty text file.
data.author: Louis Srygley

data.quote: We build our computer (systems) the way we build our cities: over time, without a plan, on top of ruins.
data.author: Ellen Ullman

data.quote: Don't comment bad code - rewrite it.
data.author: Brian Kernighan

data.quote: A programming language is for thinking about programs, not for expressing programs you've already thought of. It should be a pencil, not a pen.
data.author: Paul Graham

data.quote: Sometimes it pays to stay in bed on Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debugging Monday's code.
data.author: Dan Salomon

data.quote: ItÂ´s better to wait for a productive programmer to become available than it is to wait for the first available programmer to become productive.
data.author: Steve McConnell

data.quote: One of my most productive days was throwing away 1000 lines of code.
data.author: Ken Thompson

data.quote: System programmers are the high priests of a low cult.
data.author: Robert S. Barton

data.quote: I don't care if it works on your machine! We are not shipping your machine!
data.author: Vidiu Platon

data.quote: Measuring programming progree by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progree by weight.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: If debudding is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.
data.author: Edsger W. Dijkstra

data.quote: The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaning your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.
data.author: Rick Osborne
